title: Welcome Back, Abhinandan Varthaman! Bollywood Celebrates The Return Of IAF Pilot
text:
It’s the best news of the day. As per fresh information, IAF pilot Abhinandan Varthaman will be released tomorrow.
Indian Pilot #AbhinandanVarthaman To Return To India Tomorrow Afternoon Via Wagah Border. Air Attache Group Captain J D Kurien To Bring Him By Road. Jai Hind #AbhinandanMyHero #WelcomeBackAbhinandan — Narendra Modi (@narendramodi177) February 28, 2019
Pakistani Prime Minister Imran Khan, just declared they will be releasing our IAF pilot who was in their custody, in a gesture of peace. The entire nation welcomed this news with opened arms.
Wing Commander Abhinandan to be released tomorrow: Pak PM Imran Khan pic.twitter.com/yBbT7eeN3l — Jammu Weekly News (@jammuweeklynews) February 28, 2019
Imran in the parliament of his country announced, “Yesterday I tried to call (Prime Minister) Narendra Modi to say that we don't want escalation. Our push for de-escalation doesn't mean we are afraid. We have an Indian pilot. As a peace gesture, we will release him tomorrow”.
Don't Miss 51.2 K SHARES 605 SHARES
Twitter
Every single person is happy with this news including Bollywood celebs. From Hema Malini to Nimart Kaur, stars are celebrating the return of our brave-heart Wing Commander Abhinandan Varthaman.
Twitter
So glad to hear about the release of #WingCommanderAbhinandan. Our hearts swell with pride and joy and we are all waiting to welcome our braveheart back🙏 Jai Hind 🇮🇳 🇮🇳 #WelcomeBackAbhinandan — Vivek Anand Oberoi (@vivekoberoi) February 28, 2019
🙏🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🇮🇳🙏. Happy to hear our pilot is going to be released tomorrow🙏 God bless! — Hema Malini (@dreamgirlhema) February 28, 2019
Thank you Mr @ImranKhanPTI for releasing #WingCommanderAbhinandan and caring for an Indian soldier's life. Please also genuinely work towards combating terrorism with us that hurts innocents and halts progress of both countries. We only want progress and our safety, not war. — Chetan Bhagat (@chetan_bhagat) February 28, 2019
Excellent to know braveheart #WingCommanderAbhinandan will be home tomorrow. May this be the beginning to the end of all war murmurs. #AboutTime — Nimrat Kaur (@NimratOfficial) February 28, 2019
This made my day !!! #WingCommandarAbhinandan will be back with us tomorrow. #WelcomeBackAbhinandan . 🇮🇳 — SONAL CHAUHAN (@sonalchauhan7) February 28, 2019
Huge respect for this man @ImranKhanPTI , a big thank you for returning #Abhinanadan tomorrow and truly setting an example that we all want peace. 🙏 — meera chopra (@MeerraChopra) February 28, 2019
Oh god! U really need to calm down @TimesNow ! Bowing down ????? Let him come back home safe first ! U are jeopardising it with ur big mouth ! The volume is loud but substance is zero ! https://t.co/k7TnzcNfBm — Gauahar Khan (@GAUAHAR_KHAN) February 28, 2019
Bhaisaab, #Abhinandan ko lautne toh deejiye, please? Baad mein credit le leejiyega.
Zara si sharm kar loge toh kya nuksaan hoga? https://t.co/MYPqUMa5XW — VISHAL DADLANI (@VishalDadlani) February 28, 2019
